member.name: T:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater
member.summary: The ClientUpdater class represents the primary interface for consuming applications with the AutoUpdate system. It encapsulates all the functionality that will typically be required to Detect, Download and Apply updates to consuming applications.

member.name: T:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.IClientUpdater
member.summary: The IClientUpdater interface represents the primary interface for consuming applications with the AutoUpdate system. It encapsulates all the functionality that will typically be required to Detect, Download and Apply updates to consuming applications.

member.name: M:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.IClientUpdater.UpdateAvailable
member.summary: Contact the server and determine if an update for software with the previously specified ProductFamily name is available.

member.name: M:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.IClientUpdater.UpdateAvailableAsync
member.summary: Asynchronous wrapper for UpdateAvailable() method

member.name: M:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.IClientUpdater.UpdateDownloaded
member.summary: Determines whether a previously requested download has completed.
member.returns: true if the update has downloaded successfully.

member.name: M:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.IClientUpdater.DownloadLatestUpdate
member.summary: Attempt to download the latest update for the product from the server. No updates are available.

member.name: M:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.IClientUpdater.DownloadLatestUpdateAsync
member.summary: Attempt to download the latest update for the product from the server asynchronously. Triggers DownloadComplete event on success, DownloadFailed event on failure.

member.name: M:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.IClientUpdater.ApplyUpdate(Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.UpdateApplicationParameters)
member.summary: Apply a previously downloaded application update. No new application update exists to apply. Parameters to use when applying the update.

member.name: M:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.IClientUpdater.ApplyUpdateAsync(Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.UpdateApplicationParameters)
member.summary: Attempt to apply the latest update for the product asynchronously. Triggers UpdateComplete event on success, UpdateFailed event on failure. Parameters to use when applying the update.

member.name: P:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.IClientUpdater.ProductFamily
member.summary: The unique Product identity string, used by the Auto Update system to detect and process update requests. Must be set before any methods can be called.

member.name: E:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.IClientUpdater.DownloadComplete
member.summary: Event triggered when an asynchronous download has completed successfully.

member.name: E:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.IClientUpdater.DownloadFailed
member.summary: Event triggered when an asynchronous download has failed due to an exception.

member.name: E:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.IClientUpdater.UpdateComplete
member.summary: Event triggered when an asynchronous update install has completed successfully.

member.name: E:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.IClientUpdater.UpdateFailed
member.summary: Event triggered when an asynchronous update install has failed due to an exception.

member.name: M:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor. Sets the basepath and creates the associated directory. Not to be called from Client code.

member.name: M:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create an instance with the specified ProductFamily name.
member.param: The ProductFamily name of the product to be updated.

member.name: M:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create an instance with the specified ProductFamily name and Web Service URL.
member.param: The ProductFamily name of the product to be updated.
The URL to use to access the Auto Update Web Service

member.name: M:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.#ctor(System.String,System.String,Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.FileDownloader)
member.summary: Create an instance with the specified ProductFamily name, Web Service URL and Downloader.
member.param: The ProductFamily name of the product to be updated.
The URL to use to access the Auto Update Web Service
The Downloader to use to download updates from the server.

member.name: M:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.UpdateAvailable
member.summary: Contact the server and determine if an update for software with the previously specified ProductFamily name is available.

member.name: M:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.UpdateAvailableAsync
member.summary: Asynchronous wrapper for UpdateAvailable() method. Fires UpdateAvailableComplete on method success (result in event args) Fires UpdateAvailableFailed on exception

member.name: M:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.DownloadLatestUpdate
member.summary: Attempt to download the latest update for the product from the server. No updates are available.

member.name: M:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.DownloadLatestUpdateAsync
member.summary: Attempt to download the latest update for the product from the server asynchronously. Triggers DownloadComplete event on success, DownloadFailed event on failure.

member.name: M:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.UpdateDownloaded
member.summary: Determines whether a previously requested download has completed.
member.returns: true if the update has downloaded successfully.

member.name: M:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.ApplyUpdate
member.summary: Apply a previously downloaded application update with no parameters. No new application update exists to apply.

member.name: M:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.ApplyUpdate(Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.UpdateApplicationParameters)
member.summary: Apply a previously downloaded application update. List of parameters to use when applying update. Using the value null runs the udpate in process with current user credentials. No new application update exists to apply.

member.name: M:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.ApplyUpdateAsync(Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.UpdateApplicationParameters)
member.summary: Attempt to apply the latest update for the product asynchronously. Triggers UpdateComplete event on success, UpdateFailed event on failure.

member.name: P:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.Log
member.summary: Stream to which logging messages are written

member.name: P:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.BasePath
member.summary: Represents the base location where downloaded updates are stored on a user's machine. Sub-directories off this location are created to further organise these downloads.

member.name: P:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.ProductFamily
member.summary: The unique Product identity string, used by the Auto Update system to detect and process update requests. Must be set before any methods can be called. attempted access when no product family specified.

member.name: P:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.ProductVersion
member.summary: The version of the product specified in ProductFamily that is currently installed.

member.name: P:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.UserId
member.summary: The string supplied to the AutoUpdate server that is used to determine group accessibility of updates.

member.name: P:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.Proxy
member.summary: Forwards underlying webservice Proxy Property

member.name: E:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.UpdateAvailableComplete
member.summary: Event triggered when an asynchronous update available check has completed successfully.

member.name: E:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.UpdateAvailableFailed
member.summary: Event triggered when an asynchronous download has failed due to an exception.

member.name: E:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.DownloadComplete
member.summary: Event triggered when an asynchronous download has completed successfully.

member.name: E:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.DownloadFailed
member.summary: Event triggered when an asynchronous download has failed due to an exception.

member.name: E:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.DownloadSize
member.summary: When fired, indicates the total download size for the current pending download Useful to set the maximum value property on a progress bar.

member.name: E:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.DownloadProgress
member.summary: When fired, indicates the cumulative download progress for the current pending download Useful to set the value property on a progress bar.

member.name: E:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.UpdateComplete
member.summary: Event triggered when an asynchronous update install has completed successfully.

member.name: E:Korbitec.AutoUpdate.ClientUpdates.ClientUpdater.UpdateFailed
member.summary: Event triggered when an asynchronous update install has failed due to an exception.
